Class SingleChildWidget

java.lang.Object
clutter.abstractwidgets.Widget
clutter.abstractwidgets.ParentWidget
clutter.abstractwidgets.SingleChildWidget
All Implemented Interfaces:
ClickEventController.ClickEventHandler, clutter.debug.Debuggable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Box, Center, ClampToFit, Clickable, Clip, ConstrainedBox, DecoratedBox, DragHandle, FlexibleWidget, FractionBox, GrowToFit, Offset, OverflowBox, Padding, ScrollBox, SizedBox, WidgetBuilder
public abstract class SingleChildWidget extends ParentWidget
A widget that can have only one child widget.
